overview: Jana marries a rich young man and travels to Greece, but he treats her dryly and terrorizes her inside the house, so she escapes from him and returns to Egypt, so she decides to reopen her father's atelier in Naama Bay. She meets a group of young men who are trying to work in Sharm El Sheikh and falls in love with one of them, but she feels That her husband is still chasing her.
title: Neama Bay
